Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to construct a DECLARE model in pm4py style. The model is a Python dictionary with keys corresponding to DECLARE template types. For unary constraints keys are activities strings. For binary constraints keys are tuples of activities.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The scenario describes a product design and launch process. Typical order: IG then DD then TFC and CE then PC then LT and UT then AG then MP then FL.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Include init IG. Existence and exactly_one for all activities. Succession constraints for pairs like IG DD DD TFC DD CE TFC PC CE PC PC LT PC UT LT AG UT AG AG MP MP FL.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Succession A B means Response A B and Precedence B A. Using succession for pairs enforces both directions. For forks like PC after both TFC and CE use succession TFC PC and CE PC.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Succession constraints enforce partial order: DD before TFC and CE PC after both LT and UT after PC AG after both. Allows TFC CE in any order LT UT any order.

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - IND
Text: Consider rework loops like after UT back to PC. Succession PC UT holds if each PC has UT after and each UT has PC before. Model allows simple loops.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Add nonsuccession FL X for all X to ensure after FL nothing occurs. Include exactly_one for all to prevent repetitions.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Set support and confidence to 1.0 for all constraints indicating perfect conformance. Use dict support 1.0 confidence 1.0 for each constraint value.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Model allows traces with exactly one each activity in consistent order like IG DD TFC CE PC LT UT AG MP FL. Prevents invalid orders like AG before UT.
